rules.description: Used to allocate Cases to the Service Desk queue when submitted via the Portal as the Napili template does not currently support Case Assignment rules
if case is opened again, clear Total Delivery Days field
When the Case is of Type Amendment and Open, then the Status should be In Progress.
If the Customer Variation Signoff Checkbox is unchecked, then the Date / Time field should be wiped clean too.
If the Clear Supplier Variation Checkbox is unchecked then the accompanying Date/Time field needs to be wiped.
When Customer Variation Signoff checkbox is ticked, the accompanying date field should be stamped with the current date/time.
Timestamp when the checkbox is ticked.

rules.fullName: Case%3A Email notification to contact on Enquiry closure
rules.description: Case: Email notification to contact on Enquiry closure
rules.formula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName ='Enquiry', ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Closed'), LEFT(CreatedById, 15) <> $Setup.Org_Settings__c.Portal_Guest_User_Id__c ) && Case_Closed__c = false && NOT(OR(No_Close_Email__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Resolution_1__c, "SPAM"), ISPICKVAL(Resolution_1__c, "Duplicate")))

rules.fullName: Case%3A Email notification to contact on Enquiry creation
rules.description: Case: Email notification to contact when their Enquiry has been created
rules.formula: AND( NOT(CONTAINS(Subject, 'Portal Registration : Unassigned Customer Contact for allocation')) && NOT(RecordType.DeveloperName = "HR_Enquiry") && ISBLANK(SuppliedEmail) )

rules.description: Sets case origin to spring brochure for any forms submitted requesting the brochure
This rules track if the case was closed in the history

rules.fullName: Case%3A Update IsRes1Filled Checkbox when Res 1 filled
rules.description: Update the checkbox when Res1 is filled in
Clear the timestamp of the DWP MCAT if the Received checkbox is unticked.
